'''''Gymnopilus angustifolius''''' is a [[species]] of [[mushroom]] in the [[Cortinariaceae]] family.

==Description==

The [[pileus (mycology)|cap]] is {{convert|1.5|to|3|cm|in|1}} in diameter.<ref name="isbn0-945345-39-9">{{cite book |author=Hesler LR. |title=North American Species of ''Gymnopilus'' (Mycologia Memoir Series: No 3) |publisher=Lubrecht & Cramer Ltd |location=Knoxville, Tennessee |year=1969 |pages=68–69 |isbn=0-945345-39-9}}</ref>
